item.title: How to Become Better (Developer)
item.description: Fundamentals are forever. So it would be wise to invest your time to grow those.

item.title: Interesting reads - volume #13
item.description: Woohoo, we're already at lucky number 13! Did you know that number 13 is considered lucky to the Chinese? Featuring @adamwathan, @marcelpociot, @calebporzio and many others.
